unnormalised: A lot of people get confused about the various govt issued ID cards in India, so let me try to clarify. Basically, you have Aadhaar, PAN, Voter ID, Driving License, and Passport. Aadhaar, with its 12-digit number (e.g., 1234-5678-9012), is primarily a proof of residence. It's not strictly a citizenship document but is accepted widely for KYC.
normalised: A lot of people get confused about the various government issued I-D cards in India, so let me try to clarify. Basically, you have Aadhaar, P-A-N, Voter I-D, Driving License, and Passport. Aadhaar, with its twelve-digit number (e.g., one thousand two hundred and thirty four hyphen five thousand six hundred and seventy eight hyphen nine thousand and twelve), is primarily a proof of residence. It's not strictly a citizenship document but is accepted widely for K-Y-C.

unnormalised: Then there's the PAN card – that's Permanent Account Number – which is essential for all financial transactions. You need it for everything from opening a bank account to filing your Income Tax Return. The PAN is a 10-character alphanumeric code, something like ABCDE1234F. Voter ID, often called the EPIC (electoral photo ID card), helps you vote and is also a proof of identity; it will have an ID like XYZ1234567. Remember to check the expiry date if mentioned on the card!
normalised: Then there's the P-A-N card – that's Permanent Account Number – which is essential for all financial transactions. You need it for everything from opening a bank account to filing your Income Tax Return. The P-A-N is a ten-character alphanumeric code, something like A-B-C-D-E one thousand two hundred and thirty four F. Voter I-D, often called the E-P-I-C (electoral photo I-D card), helps you vote and is also a proof of identity; it will have an I-D like X-Y-Z one thousand two hundred and thirty four thousand five hundred and sixty seven. Remember to check the expiry date if mentioned on the card!

unnormalised: Driving Licenses, issued by regional transport offices (RTOs), prove you're legally allowed to drive. They contain a license number like DL-123456789012345. Lastly, a Passport is what you need for international travel. It's issued by the Ministry of External Affairs and has details like passport no. AB1234567. Keep them safe, folks! They are important!
